salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Get Contact
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT CustomerId__c, FirstName, LastName, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Phone, Email, OtherStreet, OtherCity, OtherPostalCode, OtherState, OtherCountry FROM Contact WHERE CustomerId__c = ':customerId'

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { customerId: payload.CustomerId__c, firstName: payload.FirstName, lastName: payload.LastName, phoneNumber: payload.Phone, emailAddress: payload.Email, deliveryAddresses: [ { "type": "SHIPPING", address: payload.OtherStreet, city: payload.OtherCity, postalCode: payload.OtherPostalCode, state: payload.OtherState, country: payload.OtherCountry }, { "type": "BILLING", address: payload.MailingStreet, city: payload.MailingCity, postalCode: payload.MailingPostalCode, state: payload.MailingState, country: payload.MailingCountry } ] }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { CustomerId__c: payload.customerId, FirstName: payload.firstName, LastName: payload.lastName, (MailingStreet: vars.postalAddress.address) if vars.postalAddress?, (MailingCity: vars.postalAddress.city) if vars.postalAddress?, (MailingPostalCode: vars.postalAddress.postalCode) if vars.postalAddress?, (MailingState: vars.postalAddress.state) if vars.postalAddress?, (MailingCountry: vars.postalAddress.country) if vars.postalAddress?, Phone: payload.phone, Email: payload.email, (OtherStreet: vars.deliveryAddress.address) if vars.deliveryAddress?, (OtherCity: vars.deliveryAddress.city) if vars.deliveryAddress?, (OtherPostalCode: vars.deliveryAddress.postalCode) if vars.deliveryAddress?, (OtherState: vars.deliveryAddress.state) if vars.deliveryAddress?, (OtherCountry: vars.deliveryAddress.country) if vars.deliveryAddress? }

salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Check Contact
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Id FROM Contact WHERE CustomerId__c=':customerId'
